festival.name: Nation Sound Festival
festival.description: Rejoignez-nous pour une expérience inoubliable avec les meilleurs talents musicaux internationaux.

faq.question: How can I buy tickets?
faq.answer: You can purchase your tickets online through our ticketing section on the website.

faq.question: Are there accommodation options available?
faq.answer: Yes, multiple accommodation options are available near the festival site, including hotels, hostels, and campsites.

access.rer: Line C, Gare de Saint-Cloud stop
access.shuttles: Free shuttles available from mentioned stations to the festival site.

practicalInfo.food: Multiple food and drink stands available on site from 12:00 to 23:00.
practicalInfo.security: Please follow all security guidelines. Prohibited items include glass bottles, weapons, etc. Searches will be conducted at the entrance.
